headline: Brown: Ohio lawmakers ‘mean business’ about submarine readiness
author: Richard Payerchin
sentences: Rob Portman, Rep. Marcy Kaptur, Rep. Tim Ryan and Rep. Shontel Brown in a bipartisan letter to Navy Secretary Carlos Del Toro to ask about naval submarine readiness.
Ohio lawmakers in Congress mean business about locating a possible naval submarine shipyard and support complex in Lorain and Lordstown, Sen. Sherrod Brown said.
